name: deportation
content:

the action of forcing someone to leave a country, especially someone who has no legal right to be there or who has broken the law: There were mass deportations in the 1930s, when thousands of people were forced to leave the country. Their cases will be reviewed and they may face deportation. See
deport
More examplesFewer examplesdeportation of illegal immigrantsKambo was in prison awaiting possible deportation.He will remain free until the deportation proceedings are concluded.
